channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My husband’s brother left his $600K estate to a friend. Can we contest the will? He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD.
item.description: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.”

item.title: ‘We are acquaintances, not friends’: My neighbors need somewhere to stay after a house fire. Do I say yes?
item.description: “We feel obliged to offer our house to this couple to live in while they deal with this horrible experience.”

item.title: Trump signs the Genius Act into law, in significant step for U.S. crypto regulation
item.description: President Trump said the crypto industry was once “mocked and dismissed and counted out,” but now could become a big buyer of U.S. government debt.

item.title: Bit Origin (BTOG) Skyrockets Nearly 90% as It Bets Big on Dogecoin
item.description: As of this writing, shares of Bit Origin Ltd. (NASDAQ: BTOG) are up over 90%, making it one of the biggest gainers in the market today—and it’s all th...

item.title: Block is the latest to get an S&P 500 nod, and its stock is climbing
item.description: Robinhood misses out on S&P 500 inclusion once again, as Square parent company is chosen to replace Hess.

item.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
item.description: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA.”

item.title: Telomir (TELO) Stock Skyrockets After Cancer Breakthrough—Here’s What It Means for Traders
item.description: As of this writing, shares of Telomir Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ: TELO) are up more than 140% intraday, making it one of the top-performing stocks on the...

item.title: These stocks reporting earnings next have a history of beating expectations
item.description: Companies reporting earnings next week with a history of beating expectations include Chipotle Mexican Grill.

item.title: Play online gaming stock Genius Sports for a prospective breakout, says Carter Worth
item.description: Chart analyst Carter Worth sees the stock breaking out of a tight range.

item.title: Strong start for earnings season creates support for Wall Street's record highs
item.description: Thus far, 83% of S&P 500 companies have beaten earnings expectations, according to FactSet's John Butters.

item.title: Buy Chipotle Mexican Grill stock for 'best in class' value, says BMO Capital Markets
item.description: Shares have pulled back more than 11% so far in 2025.

item.title: Buy this streaming stock ahead of its earnings report later this month, says JPMorgan
item.description: JPMorgan reiterated an overweight rating on the streaming stock in a Friday note and raised its price target.

item.title: AgEagle’s DoD Green Light Sends UAVS Stock Flying: Here’s What Traders Should Know
